title: Sentinels: A Distant Star
description: "The best superhuman science fiction epic I have ever read. Period." --Adrian Watts, author of Golden Age Adventures "A DISTANT STAR is Sci Fi dialed up to classic rock levels!" --RevolutionSF.com (8/10 starred review) After helping to save the world, all Esro Brachis wanted was a little peace and quiet. Then the giant robot attacked. And the alien warships landed in his back yard. And then things got really crazy. At least he has a beautiful alien warrior woman at his side-- if only she didn't want to kill him! SENTINELS: A DISTANT STAR is a fast-paced, 313-page novel that continues the journey and the excitement in a bigger, bolder adventure, with all your favorite heroes and villains back for more... and with many new wonders to encounter! "It's solid fun." --RevolutionSF.com
author: Van Allen Plexico
